Another Sample Blog Post

Brian Smith wrote this on March 2, 2014

One of the most difficult things about bootstrapping a startup is the financial uncertainty. When will my company make money? Will my company make money? If it does, will it be enough to support my company’s operations and the people involved?

One of the most difficult things about bootstrapping a startup is the financial uncertainty. When will my company make money? Will my company make money? If it does, will it be enough to support my company’s operations and the people involved?
